type.name: org.gradle.platform.base.ToolChain
type.description: A set of compilers that are used together to construct binaries.

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description:
Returns a human consumable name for this tool chain.
@since 1.11

property.name: displayName
property.description:
Returns a human consumable name for this tool chain.
@since 1.11
